description: This simple and satisfying pie is quick to whip up for a midweek meal everyone will love.
name: Beef Mince & Mushroom Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the leek and mushrooms for 5 minutes, add the beef mince for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in the tomato puree and flour and cook for 1 minute. Pour over the stock and a dash of Worcestershire sauce to taste and simmer for 20 minutes, until the beef is tender and sauce has reduced.

Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Pour the beef mince mix into a large ovenproof dish and top with puff pastry, trimming the edges as necessary. Brush the pastry with butter, cut a steam hole in the middle and bake for 25 minutes, until golden.
